Name: Created
Description: A Batch has been created in the POD. The default status for Batches.

Name: Packed
Description: Enough packed Bins to make up a Batch have been assigned to this Batch.

Name: Shipped
Description: The Batch has been shipped to the digitization facility in its entirety.

Name: Returned
Description: The Batch has been returned from the digitization facility. Bins have not been checked to determine if all originally shipped Bins are present on return.

Name: Returned Incomplete
Description: The Batch was returned missing Bins originally shipped with the Batch

Name: Returned Complete
Description: The Batch was returned with all originally shipped Bins.

Name: Unpacked
Description: All Bins have had their status set to Unpacked. The total status of the Batch is determined by the aggregate of Bin statuses.
